titles.title: Who Is On The Lord's Side Stand And Be Counted

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who is on the Lord's side,
Stand and be counted.
Who is on the Lord's side,
Walk with me!
Who is on the Lord's side,
Stand and be counted, for eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As for me and my house, we shall serve Him,
As for me and my house we shall stand.
Who is on the Lord's side stand and be counted,
For the promised land!
